name: Rocket Girl Skyline
description:
A metroidvania made  for Metroidvania month 19th challenge, make a Metroidvania game in a month!

Angelra misses her school bus! She must use her jetpack to find her way to school. Explore, upgrade, and find your way out of the barren land.

Control Move Left, Right←, → / A, DJump, Select Menu Space / ZUse JetpackX / AltMove while using Jetpack, Menu↑,←,↓ ,→ / WASDMelee attack  C / Ctrl

 

Credit

SFX:  xthemecore

VST for BGM & SFX using Magical 8bit Plug
